ids_info.name: disruption
ids_info.description: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ...

disruption/profiles_1d.documentation: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ...

disruption/profiles_1d/grid.documentation: Radial grid. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/rho_tor_norm.documentation: Normalized toroidal flux coordinate. The normalizing value for rho_tor_norm, is the toroidal flux coordinate at the equilibrium boundary (LCFS or 99.x % of the LCFS in case of a fixed boundary equilibium calculation, see time_slice/boundary/b_flux_pol_norm in the equilibrium IDS). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/rho_tor.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate = sqrt(phi/(pi*b0)), where the toroidal magnetic field, b0, corresponds to that stored in vacuum_toroidal_field/b0 and pi can be found in the IMAS constants. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/rho_pol_norm.documentation: Normalized poloidal flux coordinate = sqrt((psi(rho)-psi(magnetic_axis)) / (psi(LCFS)-psi(magnetic_axis))). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/psi.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux. Integral of magnetic field passing through a contour defined by the intersection of a flux surface passing through the point of interest and a Z=constant plane. If the integration surface is flat, the surface normal vector is in the increasing vertical coordinate direction, Z, namely upwards. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/volume.documentation: Volume enclosed inside the magnetic surface. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/area.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/surface.documentation: Surface area of the toroidal flux surface. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/psi_magnetic.documentation: Value of the poloidal magnetic flux at the magnetic axis (useful to normalize the psi array values when the radial grid doesn't go from the magnetic axis to the plasma boundary). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/grid/psi_boundary.documentation: Value of the poloidal magnetic flux at the plasma boundary (useful to normalize the psi array values when the radial grid doesn't go from the magnetic axis to the plasma boundary). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

disruption/profiles_1d/j_runaways.documentation: Runaways parallel current density = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 = Disruption/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices.

disruption/profiles_1d/power_density_con.documentation: Power density of conductive losses to the wall (positive sign for losses). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices.

disruption/profiles_1d/power_density_rad.documentation: Power density of radiative losses (positive sign for losses). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices.

disruption/profiles_1d/time.documentation: Time. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within profiles_1d container: Radial profiles for a set of time slices.

disruption/vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition and in the normalization of current densities). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ...

disruption/vacuum_toroidal_field/r0.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane). Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within vacuum_toroidal_field container: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition and in the normalization of current densities).

disruption/vacuum_toroidal_field/b0.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ... Within vacuum_toroidal_field container: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition and in the normalization of current densities).

disruption/time.documentation: Generic time. Within disruption IDS: Description of physics quantities of specific interest during a disruption, in particular halo currents, etc ...
